12th Gen Intel Core Performance

The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 laptop's 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1245U 10-Core CPU offers performance cores that can be clocked up to 4.4 GHz to power demanding programs, while efficiency cores manage background activities and multitasking. The Surface Pro 9 also comes with 8GB of LPDDR5 RAM and 512GB of M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD storage. The Surface Pro 9 not only provides performance, but it can also tackle your duties with up to 15.5 hours of battery life on a single charge (battery life may vary based on use).

13" PixelSense Touchscreen

Connectivity
